name: Nation Rise
description:
Imagine that you were God and human history was in your hand!
Nation Rise was a real strategy game.You can choose one ancient nation and lead it to write its new history.
It requires both macro strategy and micro control.

1. 19 different nations could be chosen.
2. Each nation has its own talent and use it.
3. The situation of the world changes fast and you should always make the right strategic decision,which could be updating the age,doing some useful research or strengthening your army.
4. Remember that you have 5050 years to conquer the whole world,from 3000 B.C. to 2050 A.D.
5. When you enter Information Age,you can launch missiles to any others,which can cause great damage.Also,don't forget to build Missile Defense Systems.

Enjoy the game and write your own history!
